title: need help with championship thresh code
body: I bought the thresh statue from worlds with the championship thresh code, i followed what on the card but when i want to go to the site its opens up a window with a background but nothing more, theres no text or input i can do, What can i do to solve this?

replies.body:
Hey Gzes,

There are some times where there may be connectivity issues to the website. I would recommend checking back every now and then to see if the website is back up.
Had the same thing happen but the site was back up and running not to long ago! Give it another wack :) {{champion:412}} {{champion:412}} {{item:3010}}

I got the exact same problem :( got my statue today and was super happy, then wanted to redeem the code but the website champthresh.leagueoflegends.com does only load the background with nothing to click on. looking for a solution too
